title: Alphabetties
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042419/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Alphabetties**

An unorganized group of highly organized women whom all share a love of type and typography.

[Tiffany Wardle](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042419/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tiffany%20Wardle) originally coined the phrase [Alphabetty](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042419/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alphabetty) in a private e-mail to a friend, May 5, 2003, and has since used it as a sort of nickname.

Current members are as follows:

[Jill Bell](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042419/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jill%20Bell)  
Kristin Dooley  
 [Zara Evens](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042419/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Zara%20Evens)  
Calliope Gazetas  
Shelley Gruendler  
Jemma Gura  
Karen Huang  
Nicole Larue  
 [Tamye Riggs](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042419/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tamye%20Riggs)  
 [Sara Soskolne](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042419/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sara%20Soskolne)  
 [Ilene Strizver](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042419/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ilene%20Strizver)  
Tiffany Wardle  
 [Dyana Weissman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042419/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Dyana%20Weissman)
author: Thomas Phinney
